snippet: Joaquim Rodríguez of Spain strengthened his overall lead with a mountaintop victory in Stage 14.
abstract: Joaquim Rodriguez of Spain strengthens his overall lead with a mountaintop victory in Stage 14 of the Vuelta a Espana bike race.
lead_paragraph: Joaquim Rodríguez of Spain strengthened his overall lead with a mountaintop victory in Stage 14.

headline.seo: Joaquim Rodríguez Expands Lead in the Vuelta a España
headline.main: Rodríguez Expands Lead in the Vuelta a España
